message.body:
how are you? what's going on? what's shakin'?
check this out: http://www.soundcloud.com/blahblahblahblahblah-666
mp3 makes it sound harsh, but you'll get the idea.
I will listen when I get a minute!

cool. thanks!
also...i got two possible photo gigs for you - if you're interested...

Of course! looking forward to listening.
What type of photo stuff?

1) a bat mitzvah. political/personal details later. low key. small-medium crowd. short reception afterwards.
2) photo and poss video for my band. promo stuff. for website, music video, cd jacket, etc...
Sounds cool to me. Keep me posted for sure!

i leave tomorrow for AZ for 2 weeks. we'll talk in depth when i get back.
bat mitzvah is 4/27. evening.
in the meantime, when you listen, lemme know what you think.
talk to you soon! have a great day!
xoxoxo
